title: Championship Aapolo Argentina

what.title: What is Aapolo?
what.content: This sporting event is also known as "El Abierto" this championship is the most important international inter-club competition and the fifth oldest in the world with more than 125 years.

goal.title: The main objectives
goal.content: The AAP competition moved towards digital transformation implementing cashless payments for 6 weekends in a row in order to create the best guest experiences and increase customer spending at the site. It notably reflected in the numbers with a higher revenue compared to past editions.

cta: Ready to go digital? Implement cashless payments and provide better guest experiences in you sporting event!

review.name: Nicolas Filippini
review.content: Easygoband has become our essential one stop solution for agile processing, increasing our revenue and maintaining total control over our event.
